text: After Hours is the second studio album by the American pop band, Timeflies, released through Island Records on April 29, 2014. == Background == The recording of the album took place between 2012 and 2013 in their home studio in New York City. == Chart performance == On the issue dated May 17, 2014, After Hours debuted at number 8 on the US Billboard 200, selling 20,000 copies in its first week. The album has sold 36,000 copies in the US as of August 2015. == Track listing == ==Weekly charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! Chart (2014) ! Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:2014 albums Category:Timeflies albums
title: After Hours (Timeflies album)
